entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 80
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
